dialogue.speaker: Luke Skywalker
dialogue.text: Help me, Obi-Wan Kenobi. You're my only hope.

dialogue.speaker: Obi-Wan Kenobi
dialogue.text: Patience, young one. The Force will be with you.

dialogue.speaker: Luke Skywalker
dialogue.text: I've never flown a ship like this before. What if I crash?

dialogue.speaker: Han Solo
dialogue.text: Kid, don't worry. I'll show you the ropes.
